summary: This document is a financial record showing a wire transfer of $7.4 million from Jeffrey Epstein to Ghislaine Maxwell on June 15, 2007. The transaction originated from the US Virgin Islands and was sent to a US-based beneficiary. The document appears to be part of a disclosure to the Assistant U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: He is identified as the person who originated a $7.4 million wire transaction from the US Virgin Islands on June 15, 2007.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is identified as the beneficiary who received the $7.4 million wire transaction from Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The document appears to be addressed or disclosed to this office, though no specific individual is named.

connections.description: Epstein sent a wire transfer of $7.4 million to Maxwell, indicating a significant financial transaction between them.

events.title: $7.4 Million Wire Transfer
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein originated a wire transaction for $7,400,000.00 from the US Virgin Islands to beneficiary Ghislaine Maxwell in the US.

keyFacts: On June 15, 2007, Jeffrey Epstein transferred $7.4 million to Ghislaine Maxwell via wire transfer.
The transaction originated from the US Virgin Islands and was sent to a beneficiary located in the United States.
The document is addressed to the Assistant U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York, suggesting it was part of a legal or investigative disclosure.
